context: I have a Wii that I need to connect to my Vizio E550i-B2.  If I buy this cable, where do I insert the video portion?  I also have HD cables connected.
response: I looked up your television model you only have one slot for component cables just plug in the matching colors red to red white to white green to green blue to blue etc.  Cables work great.  Make sure to change wii settings to 480p under settings

context: I can not tell from you image does this take the Wii to HDMI??
response: No just component, red, green, blue, then white and another red for audio. NO HDMI

context: Will this code works for any PS4 region and any Battlefield 4 version ?
response: As long as you already have purchased Battlefield 4 for the PS4, it should work, seeing as any digital content registered with the PlayStation Network works in almost any region (which is why 80% of my games are digital downloads). ?Good luck!

You will need to purchase a USB adapter. Most recent Macs have a 3.5mm line level input, but the mic will not work without an amplifier or phantom power. The G430 has the adapter included. You can purchase the G430's adapter on an auction site. It will allow you to use the G230 with a USB port.

context: Can you put PS 1 Emulators on these?  Like on smart phones?
response: Not that I'm aware of.  Sony really tried cracking down hard i the jump from the PSP to the Vita, hence the proprietary memory cards and game cartridges.  There may be a way, but it's probably too hard.

context: Does this work with a Mac?
